children.content: Obvious noninfective cause (allograft thrombosis, allergic reaction to Thymoglobulin, etc.)?
Empiric antimicrobial therapy*; consider reduction in immunosuppression
Blood cultures, urine cultures, CXR; CMV blood viral load if pretransplant donor or recipient was CMV positive
Organ-specific tests where appropriate (e.g., induced sputum, colonoscopy, lumbar puncture)
